descriptions: Implementation of a website with live broadcast of radio programs.
Installation and management of a radio automation software.
Realization of radio broadcasts as a radio animator and as a sound technician.
I realized five development projects with the different languages C, C++ and Java SE/2EE on a distant collaborative work.
Design and development of patients files management and 3D image manipulation software for medical sector.
Design and development of a portal with Liferay in Java EE for the creation/handling of incidents.
Implementation and management of a decision tree with RedHat BRMS.
Develop and manage a platform for airplane companies to follow the evolution of multiple systems to detect dangerous or alerting trends.
Development of a ServiceNow portal for the management of the various ITSM processes.
Design and development of a platform in Python and VueJS using AWS services to allow the management of many connected objects.
Management of the frontend part (reviews of code, migrations, upgrades, ui/ux).
Design and development of applications on Skywise using Slate and Workshop.
Development of the backend using datasets with PySpark.
